name: The Desert: S-D
description:
This is a prototype of the world S-D in the "universe" of HEX-S
(This is the first entry of this series)

Note:

The WebGL Application is unstable and not performant. For a better experience, consider downloading the windows application.

Particles will not work in WebGL. 

Settings are not implemented yet, for now you have to make due with the default ones...

As this is a prototype there's a lot of things that will change in the coming weeks and months. So revisit this project if you like it!

All types of feedback are appreciated!

Thanks for trying the prototype out!
/GurkMuppen
